law.catch_line: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the governing body of a county is ex officio t...

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the governing body of a county is ex officio the board of health for the county.
In a code county or charter county, the governing body is ex officio the board of health for the county, unless the governing body establishes a board of health.
